resources.string: 1. In which capital city does the Nobel Prize Award Ceremony take place?
2. Nobel Prizes are awarded in the following disciplines. Choose three correct answers.
3. For how many times and how many people and organizations have The Nobel prize and the Prize in Economic Sciences been awarded between 1901 and 2016?
4. What is the First name of the youngest Nobel Laureate to whom the Nobel Peace prize 2014 was awarded?
5. How many times have the Nobel Prize and Prize in Economic Sciences been awarded to women?
6. What kind of individuals are the Nobel Prizes awarded to?
To those who, during the preceding year, shall have conferred the greatest benefit to mankind.
To those who, during the preceding year, shall have scaled up their fortune and ascended to the list of Forbes 100.
To those who, during the preceding year, shall have taken a mission to Mars.
